## InjectedRemirrorProps.setContent() method

Replace all editor content with the new content.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
setContent(content: RemirrorContentType, triggerOnChange?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  content | <code>RemirrorContentType</code> |  |
|  triggerOnChange | <code>boolean</code> | whether onChange handlers should be triggered by the update. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`void`

## Remarks

Allows for the editor content to be overridden by force.
